website_summaries.verdict: A light and pleasant scent in a decorative bottle, making it ideal for bathrooms.
pros: Comes in a wide range of pleasant and subtle scents
Glass bottle has beautiful frosted stripe details
Arrives in attractive and durable packaging
cons: Works best in small rooms like the bathroom

customer_reviews.title: Purchase directly from Nest
customer_reviews.text: Less expensive if you purchase directly from Nest site and utilize coupon codes. Also more likely to get complimentary items.
customer_reviews.author: D. Wright

customer_reviews.title: Elegant Diffuser
customer_reviews.text: I rarely write reviews, I don't feel that I should have to review everything that I purchase. With that being said, I felt compelled to review this diffuser. First I will preface this review by saying everyone has different views about fragrances, so don't hate me if you don't like it. I absolutely LOVE this scent!!! The bottle is very classy and it has heft, not your run of the mill diffuser. The scent itself, is not overpowering but fills your house with a deliciously elegant fragrance. I will be ordering again, and I hope this review will help if you're on the fence. Sure it's pricey, but definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: K.B.

customer_reviews.title: Where is the  scent?
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased these at a store and loved the scent so I purchased two off of amazon. I know it takes a few days for the reeds to absorb the smell but after a few weeks i still have little to no scent in my home. My house is small, a little over 1000 sq. ft and with one placed at my entryway and one in my living room, I don't smell it at all. Im assuming these must have endured high heat and maybe thats why theres no scent?
customer_reviews.author: Gabriella M.

customer_reviews.title: Underperform
customer_reviews.text: I’m a huge fan of Nest fragrances but the Ocean Mist was a let down. I bought this one to place in my bathroom, and although the scent is nice you have to hold it straight up to your nose to be able to smell it. In an enclosed room, no less, the performance on this one is not up to par with their other scents. I have since replaced it with their lavender which I love; it fills the room with a beautiful fragrance and is still going strong after months. I keep the Morocan Amber in my bedroom and the performance on that one is also very strong. Wish I could’ve gotten a refund on the Ocean Mist.
customer_reviews.author: R. Wu

customer_reviews.title: I can't believe how good this smells
customer_reviews.text: I smelled the Apricot Tea at a Nordstrom years ago but couldn't bring myself to pay 50 dollars for it. I broke down an ordered it on Amazon this week, at least i got prime shipping! This scent is heavenly. I can't believe how good this smells. My husband who hates everything scent related, LOVES it!! 4 stars only because of the high price. No idea how long it will last. I hope 3 months like it claims. Apricot Tea... You won't be disappointed!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mitch Langley

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: It was really great packaging. Smells nice but it doesnt make the ENTIRE room smell like that. People on here were ranting and raving about how it was strong and covered a relatively medium size space. It just makes the entrance smell nice for a few seconds. That's it. Feel like I wasted 40 bucks
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Buchanan

customer_reviews.title: Nest Lemongrass & Ginger Fragrance
customer_reviews.text: I love, love, love this fragrance! It is subtle but divine! I have it in my powder room and sometimes I just stick my head in the door for a whiff! The aroma is clean and refreshing - not artificial at all. I like Nest products - they are the best diffusers. The fragrance sticks are black which looks elegant. If the aroma starts to fade, I just turn the sticks around and that refreshes it. Don't have anything bad to say about this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: An Expensive Mistake
customer_reviews.text: Opened it expecting a pleasant scent. It was overwhelming before even placing the sticks. Not in a good way. Read the box (after opening). Has warnings about "not inhaling fumes" not to get on skin, dangerous to aquatic animals, etc. I'd gotten it, in part, because of the website description, saying "no alcohol" and claims about purity etc. But had they put these warnings on the website page, I'd not have ordered it. Can't use it, can't return it. An expensive mistake.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: I have purchased thid Nest fragrance in department stores and it has been wonderful; the one i received from Amazon must be ...
customer_reviews.text: I am going to contact Amazon as there is next to no scent in the product I received. I have purchased thid Nest fragrance in department stores and it has been wonderful; the one i received from Amazon must be old or watered down?
customer_reviews.author: maria

customer_reviews.title: Beyond disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I purchased NEST fragrances. First time I was very pleased. The scent was not flowery, yet strong enough to fill some guest bathrooms and hallway areas. Only drawback was scent only last a month or so. I went ahead and purchased them again. This time the scent was so weak you had to sniff the jar. I emailed nest to inquire if they had a manufacturing issue or something and they would not respond at all. If this is their current quality I recommend you buy a $3.00 candle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too much for too little!
customer_reviews.text: While the etched clear bottle is pretty, the Ocean Mist and Sea Salt fragrance was almost mild at the start- then soon after it was a nonexistent even after daily turning over the reeds (which is frustrating). This is very disappointing for such an expensive product. I don't recommend this diffusing oil from Nest and have found stronger/nicer fragrances from less expensive brands like Aronica.
customer_reviews.author: J. G.

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware - scent gone bad!
customer_reviews.text: I still have remaining fragrance oil from my bottle that I bought directly through Nest. This is not the same scent!!! It obviously has gone terribly bad. I truly love this scent and know it well enough to recognize it being off!
customer_reviews.author: Boston Bean

customer_reviews.title: SADLY DID NOT SMELL
customer_reviews.text: I ordered one of these because my parents had the exact same one in their powder room. The beautiful scent filled up the whole room and I just needed to have the same one for mine. After ordering from Amazon, I've had mine for almost a year (with fluid still in the base) and it's NEVER SMELLED like anything unless you stuck your nose in the hole of the base with the fluid. I should've scent back after the 1st week of owning it. Very upset. Hopefully when the quarantine is over I can go to an actual retailer (Neimans) to get one that actually works.
customer_reviews.author: Kasey

customer_reviews.title: PERMANENT CANDLE 😍
customer_reviews.text: Truly smells like Christmas all the time. Loved having this for Christmas time since I had a fake tree! Highly recommend and already picking out my spring scent 🤗
customer_reviews.author: Marissa Lancia

customer_reviews.title: LOVE-HATE RELATIONSHIP
customer_reviews.text: LOVE-HATE RELATIONSHIP. LOVE this scent but HATE the expensive price! Really wish this product was also sold in less expensive containers to re-full the many beautiful bottles (I have 6-8 diffusers out at all times throughout the house) that I now own that now sit either empty and scentless or are filled with less expensive brands until I am willing to splurge or when I plan on guests visiting. Shame because I would ONLY buy this brand and scent if I knew that they had less expensive options.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smell gone after few days.
customer_reviews.text: Initially I was very excited about the diffuser because it smelled great for the first couple of days and guests would comment on the smell. However, after about a week the smell was completely gone (and no, its not because our noses got used to it). We would have guests come over and they would note that the smell was gone and asked us what we had done with the diffuser. Now, you literally have to stick your face in the bottle to be able to smell anything. I would save your money and get a different one. Perhaps I just got a faulty bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Wilco

customer_reviews.title: There is no scent unless you stick your nose right up to the diffuser sticks
customer_reviews.text: I purchased four of thes based on the overall reviews, for Christmas presents and for myself. I spent 200.00 dollars on these expecting them to DIFFUSE lovely smell into the room. One is in my bedroom - and one is in my daughter's room. I smell NOTHING. I flip the sticks over every other day.... nothing. I have one unopened because I have not seen the friend I am giving this to, so I thought to return it.... I found out I can not due to their policy. Thats ok, Lesson learned. Buy one and then when you realize it is lousy you are only out 50.00 instead of feeling like you got totally ripped off.
customer_reviews.author: Colette O.

customer_reviews.title: Nest makes a great diffuser. They last quite a long time and ...
customer_reviews.text: Nest makes a great diffuser. They last quite a long time and have lovely subtle fragrance. The Ocean Mist is one of my favorites. It's light and fresh smelling. I keep it in all my bathrooms and it provides a light scent without being overpowering.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lasts longer than 6 months!
customer_reviews.text: We have this diffuser in our living room and while the area it covers is not large (you need to be within maybe 6-8 feet to smell it, so it’s best on a coffee table or side table near wherever you’re entertaining people.) it lasts a very long time! We bought ours in Nov 2017 and it’s currently June 2018, still smelling amazing and there’s a good half inch of oil left! So impressive!
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Nice scent, but can be overpowering
customer_reviews.text: Ignore the scent; we all have different preferences. I liked this one. But the rubber cork in the bottle is a bear to remove and replace - it's tight! But is DOES NOT LEAK. Even using just one scent stick in a large bedroom/master bath, we found the scent to be overpowering after 24 hours. It's OK in a large room with passages to other rooms (like a den, country kitchen or game room) but for baths, bedrooms, etc. it was just too potent. A more "adjustable" and flexible means to deliver the scent is needed IMHO.
customer_reviews.author: Engineering Guy

customer_reviews.title: wholly mooolllly
customer_reviews.text: If you can leave this jar open with reeds and live in the house, more power to you. After being open for 30 mins i could taste it in my mouth, headache, i think the dog was even sneezing from it bothering him. I pulled thin strips of foil, removed the reeds from the jar and laid them in individual foils placing them around the house. I immediately closed up the bottle! This should last me the rest of my life. dang... so many things have next to no smell, this wee bottle could take care of a warehouse or entire hotel
customer_reviews.author: Stacy C.

customer_reviews.title: ... way the moroccan amber does - this is my favorite! I know the suggested use time is three ...
customer_reviews.text: Recently was gifted the vanilla and it just didn't thrill me the way the moroccan amber does - this is my favorite! I know the suggested use time is three months, but I find these scents last much longer, so the priced is somewhat mitigated by the longer use time.
customer_reviews.author: The Traveler

customer_reviews.title: Not Impressed
customer_reviews.text: This is my first Nest purchase and it will be my last. I had very high hopes for this purchase. 1. Where's the scent? I bought the cashmere & suede. Truthfully, theres more scent from a $10.00 diffuser from Walmart! 2. WAY too expensive, especially for the poor quality. Will not purchase again and I do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon L.

customer_reviews.title: Great product for a more affordable price.
customer_reviews.text: Way, way cheaper than the expensive top brands. I got my wife these sticks for Christmas because they looked good and they look safer than candles if one falls asleep. She opened the box, she seemed so pleasantly surprised!!!....two days later she wrapped it again and gave it to a visit friend for Christmas: "Would you mind if I give it to Maggie? I haven't bought anything for her!" What can I say? What I can say is no printable!!
customer_reviews.author: Mauro Chiappe

customer_reviews.title: Price 3 out of 5, Smell 11 out of 5
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty expensive fragrance, but it smells amazing. I put it in the bathroom because it seems a bit potent for a bedroom, but man it smells great. The first week or so I would deliberately go out of my way to pass the bathroom and smell it. After a week or so you need to start flipping the reeds daily in order for it to work- but this keeps it from all drying up too quickly. I've had mine several months and have yet to replace it, but my bathroom is very small
customer_reviews.author: StrandedMoose

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product that lasts a long time!
customer_reviews.text: Smells just like you have a freshly cut tree in your house all year. I buy one of these per year for my basement and the smell not only makes my basement smell amazing, but the smell also wafts up the stairs and into my kitchen and living area. A truly special product ad I’ve never seen a reed diffuser have this much range. For me, the smell lasts one full year even tho the actual oil dissipates quicker than that. Just leave it without the oil and you can STILL smell it! It is a slow release smell so give it some time to really get working! Amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: My favorite Nest scent diffuser
customer_reviews.text: Initial fresh smell permeates house & people walk in with lovely compliments on how good the house smells. As it wears down perfect lighter version of scent in surrounding hallway & 1/2 the house. I favor this scent purchased several times now.
customer_reviews.author: A. Betar

customer_reviews.title: Nice scent but limited range
customer_reviews.text: The scent itself is wonderful. I've had other Next scents and they don't make a bad one. However the last scent I had disbursed itself much better than this scent does. You can only smell this scent when you are very close to it. The other scent filled the room. Yes I used the new reeds that came in the package. And it seems that this scent evaporates faster than the last scent.
customer_reviews.author: BMan

customer_reviews.title: I delayed in posting this review as I normally LOVE Nest Fragrance Reed Diffusers and have use several different ...
customer_reviews.text: I delayed in posting this review as I normally LOVE Nest Fragrance Reed Diffusers and have use several different ones in past and currently have the Orange Blossom in our bedroom. I thought maybe it was just me using too many reeds for our smaller space however this one seems to be putting off an ammonia smell. We have friends that had the Bamboo in their bathroom and that is what made me want to order this one too.. No matter how many reeds I use however, I continue to get a whiff of ammonia rather than a natural smell. Currently I am only using 2 and regret I didn't reach out to the company prior to 30-days.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Very fragrant spicy scent.  Nice gender neutral.
customer_reviews.text: Liked the bottle a little difficult to get the cork out. Don’t love the scent. I like it ok but was hoping for less spice and more amber scent. I should have read it had eucalyptus. Have it in the guest bath with door closed. When I first opened it, the next morning had puffy eyes. But my fault for not reading. Otherwise I’d have the bottle on the entry way table. It would have been a nice way to greet guests. But they will have to stay.long enough to use the bathroom to enjoy it😂
customer_reviews.author: Jaime P. Lovci

customer_reviews.title: Bamboo too floral. Grapefruit was perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: Bamboo was way too floral for me. It isn’t floral like flowerbomb... sweet floral. But more on the walking by a bush garden type of floral. Had to return it. Stopped by a Sephora to smell others before repurchasing & totally LOVE the grapefruit. I put this in my living room/kitchen which is about 700sqft. It is very very subtle & almost not noticeable unless close by. Perhaps it’d do great in a smaller space like the bathroom? Not sure yet...
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: The smell is great, the bottle is very pretty, but the scent, which is what you are presumably buying it for is barely perceptible. If you put it under your nose, you can smell it, but don't expect to smell it from over 12 inches away. I thought at first that the room I placed it in was too large, so I moved it to a smaller one, then an even smaller one, my dressing area, 6x6. Even with the door closed, the scent is barely there, you have to really be close. A waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great holiday scent.
customer_reviews.text: I've never used any home fragrance before because most of my experience has been with chemical-smelling air fresheners and perfumes, which I can't tolerate. This is completely different to me, a pleasant blend of scents, kind of piney-spicy but not at all artificial. Many of my guests commented on the scent, thinking it came from the Christmas tree. I put this on top of a cabinet in my living room (because cats) and it quickly permeated the whole house. I found the scent a bit too strong at first, but after I removed half the reeds it was about right. After 6 weeks there is still plenty left in the bottle for next year.
customer_reviews.author: Brenna Hogan

customer_reviews.title: It's not bad, but next time I'll try something else
customer_reviews.text: The package works exactly as described. The bottle is rectangular, which makes it a little difficult to arrange the reeds, but otherwise works as expected. I'd just assume use my own diffuser bottle in the future, though it doesn't seem to be possible to buy this oil outside of this display set. Unfortunately the smell seems to be more musk and "amber" than fir or pine — not exactly the fresh pine forest smell I was going for. It's not bad, but next time I'll try something else.
customer_reviews.author: A. Barnat

customer_reviews.title: Smells like sun screen
customer_reviews.text: Fragrance is ok. I think it smells like suntan lotion, has a coconut smell. I won’t be purchasing this scent again. Have previously bought Bamboo and Orange blossom and they are fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: homecook'n 24/7

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought one. Loved it -- still works great -- strong but not overpowering smell. Bought another. No scent. Even on first day. Never had any smell. Returned the second. Nothing to explain why (older) one works, but new one doesn't. Something is off with quality control?
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Dog likes it.
customer_reviews.text: I like this scent. It's a little on the feminine side but I have a female dog and she really seems to appreciate it. I also told her I bought it for her and she barked which I think meant she said thank you in dog language. Not sure.
customer_reviews.author: HAWWWY

customer_reviews.title: SO excited to splurge on this and was not so excited about scent (Dark Amber)
customer_reviews.text: I was SUPER excited to receive my Dark Amber (typically one of my favorite bottom/top notes in all things) but, have to say after a few days with it, I am sadly underwhelmed. I think perhaps its just this scent and others may be fabulous as reviews show. I just don't think I can justify rolling the dice with another scent at almost $50 again when (due to the product having flammable material in it?) it is not returnable. Best of luck with a different scent but maybe steer clear of Dark Amber.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki P

customer_reviews.title: Barely noticeable, nothing like the candles' aroma.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this based on my previous experience with the brand & the reviews. I must say I LOVED my previous Nest candles and they put out a strong aroma. However, I'm super disappointed in this diffuser. The scent is basically non-existent. With the candles the odor filled the room. With this diffuser I have to be right it to get a faint scent and only really smell it when putting my nose next to it. So disappointed...
customer_reviews.author: Kerrie

customer_reviews.title: this may have been fake or expired.
customer_reviews.text: I use nest diffusers all the time. they are my favorite brand. this diffuser is in a guest bathroom and hardly smells. I have used this scent before several times and usually for the first few days its really really strong, then it settles in to perfect. This one for some reason had been very weak. no clue why.
customer_reviews.author: guillermo J

customer_reviews.title: Very personalized 5/5!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! Loved the personal handwritten note. Hope your new company succeeds!
customer_reviews.author: Lindy Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Nice scent not to strong.
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful scent. Not overly strong. Deep and rich...how does one describe scents, everyones likes different things, so I will talk about the power of the diffuser. I have it in a 300 sq ft room. it is mild throughout the room. Not over powering but enough that I do smell it when I get home but not after a few minutes.
customer_reviews.author: The Tam'ster

customer_reviews.title: Good For a Small Room
customer_reviews.text: I keep this in the guest bathroom and every time you open the door you can smell it. Doesn't function like an air freshener to cover smells, but keeps a nice scent it the room.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Quinn

customer_reviews.title: Scam
customer_reviews.text: I love this scent, but disappointed that I was charged $47 for an item that has a price tag with $22 on it
customer_reviews.author: Britni

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleasant, Realistic Holiday Scent
customer_reviews.text: Scent is as described (cinnamon, vanilla, spicy) minus pumpkin, as another review said. But pumpkin doesn't really have a scent, or one so light that it wouldn't matter to me if I didn't smell it. The scent didn't have the often 'fake' or plastic type smell I've found in other fragrances, and that I find a turnoff for any pleasant notes coming through. This fragrance captures all of what one would expect during Thanksgiving/fall holiday. I was pleasantly surprised and would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: True Revu

customer_reviews.title: Love this grapefruit scent.
customer_reviews.text: I love the scent and in the three years I’ve lived in our apartment it is the only thing that has covered over a annoying smell and let’s me tolerate it. I will definitely buy this again. This will be my personal home scent for years to come. (As long as I can afford it!)
customer_reviews.author: Barbara A. Luna

customer_reviews.title: Forget this
customer_reviews.text: Was recommended on YouTube so I laid out what was an exorbitant amount and was disappointed. I like the fragrance but it is too weak to smell in my 12 x 15 foot closed bedroom. A very much wasted amount of money.
customer_reviews.author: Audie

customer_reviews.title: Eehhh
customer_reviews.text: The glass and reeds look nice. The scent was very faint but the oil lasted a decent amount of time. I recommend this scent for a small area if at all. I have to keep turning the reeds
customer_reviews.author: Safib

customer_reviews.title: Smell great and lasts.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this diffuser and scent. A little pricey for me but I splurge because it smells so great and lasts for a very long time. Permeates a large area and just smells so great. This is always on my birthday and Motheds day list of gift ideas. Ideas for me of course.
customer_reviews.author: shirley

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: If you are familiar with Nest fragrances, this one has the typical Nest base - similar to Linen and Bamboo. It gets a bit annoying after a while. Lasts a really long time. Really smells like a blue garden - bluebells, forget me nots, etc.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: NOT THE SAME AS THE ONE I PURCHASE IN STORE
customer_reviews.text: I have been purchasing Nest room diffusers for 3 years from my local department store. I have always LOVED the scents and been so so pleased with how they continuously keep my room smelling so fresh for months. When I saw the price was cheaper on Amazon, I purchased the same scent I have been buying for over a year. From the beginning, this diffuser does not leave any lasting scent or freshness in my bedroom. It must be an imitation product or an expired one. So so so disappointed after spending $40+ dollars to have this outcome. Really not fair.
customer_reviews.author: Carolina Hammoud

customer_reviews.title: Fancy
customer_reviews.text: I love this scent. The pumpkin and the apple blossom are my favorite. It definitely makes a difference of where you place it in your room. I’ve tried the four corners and each place has a different potency so just kinda move it around until you find that perfect spot.
customer_reviews.author: P

customer_reviews.title: The picture misrepresents the item.
customer_reviews.text: The Picture showed the reeds but they were not included in the package. Plus, There was no indication in that picture that the reeds were not included. The picture is not a true representation of this item. This is embarrassing and frustrating because one was ordered as a gift and sent to a best friend on her birthday! Very disappointing. How can you fix this problem?
customer_reviews.author: Henry Eagle III

customer_reviews.title: Useless reeds are least of the problem!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite scent but this particular package came with about 1/2 the reeds and out of the 1/2 about 1/2 of those were broken into a million pieces. Furthermore when i opened the bottle (picture on left) and if didn’t even smell and compared it to the same one on the right that i did not buy on amazon you can see that the one i received yesterday is basically water. Don’t buy it here. This is an expensive bottle of tap water
customer_reviews.author: Patricia T Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Great smell, not suited for large spaces
customer_reviews.text: Not great for large space, but a very good smell. I bought two of these and put them in opposite ends of my living room. The initial day the smell was the perfect level, and now we have to flip the sticks to smell it. Does better in a smaller room, and the oils don't dehydrate quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Over priced mediocre diffuser oil
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with this product. The scent is okay, beautiful diffuser bottle, however the scent is not strong & does not last, quickly evaporated. This is a high dollar diffuser oil that does not live up to the hype. Save your money, buy from Pier One!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work in my home
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 3 of these and am so unhappy. For the price I expected my small home to smell wonderful. I just see the fluid level receding and not smelling. Sad
customer_reviews.author: D. Schrader

customer_reviews.title: Smells like someones grandma
customer_reviews.text: I love the home scents from Crabtree and Evelyn and was hoping to find a similar option at a cheaper price point. Well I have to say that my preferred scents are more expensive for a reason. These NEST fragrances are awful. I purchased a Lavender and an apricot scent and they smell like old lady perfume! Gross! They have no depth and smell cheap. Never. Again. The only saving grace is that I only opened one. Definitely sending the other back and throwing out the open one. Back to paying for Crabtree.
customer_reviews.author: AJ Morales

customer_reviews.title: Not like linen
customer_reviews.text: This doesn't smell bad, but it does not smell like linen, as expected. I kept it because it is still Nest quality, but I would not buy it again. At times is reminds me of the smell of cheap hair spray :(
customer_reviews.author: Emma Peel

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed - Moroccan amber
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to buy these as I've had a few of the holiday scent in the past and have purchased a few bottles of Nest perfume. They holiday scent filled my home with just the right amount of scent. I bought 2 of the Moroccan amber- one downstairs and one in my bedroom and you can not smell them at all unless you are about 2 feet away. Saw lots of great reviews here so I figured I'd buy them and I'd had a great experience in the past with a different scent, however I can not smell this scent. Going to try another but very disappointed with this item. Hopefully another scent will be better!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Randone

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I am really disappointed in this product. I was really hoping it would fill my bedroom with the wonderful smell of lavender, but it doesn’t. I can only smell it if I’m right next to it. It is a very expensive diffuser so you would think it works well. Nope. I won’t be buying this brand anymore.
customer_reviews.author: E. Marie

customer_reviews.title: Men's Cologne smell, not Lavender
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time trying a Nest product, and I like the subtlety of the smell. It doesn't bother my eyes like some other air freshening products and candles do. However, I don't know why this fragrance even has the word Lavender in it. My bedroom and hallway now smell like a Men's Cologne area of a department store. Which is not altogether bad but just not what I was going for.
customer_reviews.author: TessaHope

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: It was my understanding that NEST was an excellent brand. But I am very disappointed in the Bamboo fragrance. The scent is lovely but it just doesn't last. Like everyone else I am stuck with this. Guess I just keep changing the sticks. I'm afraid I have to go back to Alora. Its so expensive but next to this its worth it. Sorry I strayed.
customer_reviews.author: SusanC

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE, TOTALLY ADDICTIVE
customer_reviews.text: This is one of those fragrances that once you experience it, you MUST have it. I adore it and I hope that it seeps in the sheetrock of my home forever. People walk in and stop in their tracks and say, YOUR HOUSE SMELLS AMAZING. You Gotta have it!
customer_reviews.author: Anet P Granger

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Love the vanilla orchid scent. I don't find it too strong but I can definitely smell it, not as others have stated that there was hardly a scent. The scent fills up my open dining room/living room very nicely. will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: K Marie

customer_reviews.title: beautiful smell
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could afford to put several of these in my home. The smell is natural and a little indulgent without being too perfumey. I'm a huge fan. One lasted about two months in my bathroom near the vent and I had another one on a bookshelf that lasted 3 months away from moving air. I will buy the birchwood pine again for sure.
customer_reviews.author: J. Schmitt

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: This diffuser had a scent for maybe 2 days and then it was gone. It is way to expensive to only last a few days and it was very disappointing. I won’t be buying these products anymore
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Should be named floral rose not bamboo
customer_reviews.text: This should not be named Bamboo. The floral is overwhelming. Should be called ROSE. I mean instant headache I hate floral scents: I was so put off by the floral after a few hours I took out the rods, plugged the jug, and washed off the rods with water to get rid of the scent. Hilariously after washing away the product on the rods I could finally smell some bamboo scent. Floral scents smell cheap to me and give me a headache. Why do so many of your scents have flowers added while the product still costs a whopping 50$. Disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Bradley Schaller

customer_reviews.title: Bottle half empty, leaking, and stained black.
customer_reviews.text: HORRIBLE. I received my NEST fragrance completely leaking and stained black?! I ordered 2 of them (packaged separately), one came in perfect condition, the other one was so disgusting that i immediately had to throw away. It wasnt the packaging either. The packaging was intact and so was the box, the actual bottle was just completely defective and gross. I wasted $50. Threw the product out because of how nasty it was, and probably won’t even get a replacement or refund.
customer_reviews.author: rita

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Only diffuser I’ve had that actually dissipates the scent. Not too strong but does the job, and it looks pretty, too. Sometimes flip the sticks to get more scented action because I like it, but it’s not really needed.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product.
customer_reviews.text: Frankly, Nest makes the best and longest lasting diffusers. I can afford the best but I only stick with what works and this company has been remarkably consistent over these last several decades. Virtues getting harder and harder to find.
customer_reviews.author: BigRed

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a small medical office/exam room
customer_reviews.text: Attractive and the balanced savory/citrus scent smells great for my small medical office exam room. My office is small and windowless, so I want to make sure that patients experience a pleasant odor when they enter the room- especially during the summer. The scent is a little strong at first, but then tones down. I usually turn the reeds over on a Friday so that the scent is just right when I return to work on Monday.
customer_reviews.author: Harlem317

customer_reviews.title: No Scent--Doesn't Diffuse
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I love NEST's Cedar Leaf & Lavender scent, so I bought this diffuser to put in our bathroom. I've given it almost a week, and I can't smell anything unless I stand right over the diffuser reeds and inhale deeply through my nose. I've tried flipping the diffuser reeds and moving the diffuser around the room. No change. By contrast, the NEST hand soap and lotion I bought at the same time smells great. This is a huge disappointment, given the cost. I'll be seeking a refund/return.
customer_reviews.author: C. M. Dougherty

customer_reviews.title: Everyone loves this diffuser, especially me!
customer_reviews.text: I could not be happier with this purchase. The scent is lovely. The sweet tang of grapefruit perfectly captured. Mine has now been in my office at work for 2 months and the scent remains strong enough to scent my office. This is supposed to last 90 days. Well, mine has been going for 60 and still has over half the oil left! Many people who have smelled this in my office have asked for a link so they can buy their own. People LOVE this thing. NEST is definitely the way to go. I'll be buying more as needed, maybe even trying other scents. I've got my eye on the tangerine one and the orange one.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Cason

customer_reviews.title: Great smelling long lasting Reed Difussers !!!
customer_reviews.text: Nest Reed difussers are the best ! I've had many over the years and they never disappoint. Nordstrom is the only place in my area to go test all the smells or purchase one. I love that I am able to get it from Amazon and that sometimes it's on sale. I always get compliments on how my house smells . I'm Very satisfied and I highly recommend this product !!!
customer_reviews.author: Cristian Farcas

customer_reviews.title: Love this scent and it really does fill up the entire house
customer_reviews.text: The scent is lovely but besides that it’s strong enough to smell on the entire first floor of my house! I was shocked that it could cover that much area. I highly recommend this brand. It’s worth the money compared to the other pens that are cheap and barely can even scent a bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: kalypso

customer_reviews.title: Great but no reeds
customer_reviews.text: I was sooo excited to receive this after smelling the amazing scent in my coworkers office, but when I got it, there were no reeds included! It looks like there were supposed to be based on looking at the packaging...
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Hardaker

customer_reviews.title: Great Smell Awesome purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is worth every penny, I smelled this scent at our neighbor Pizza Restaurant Razzi's I asked the owner the name and he told me he got it here on Amazon, I bought it and now my apartment smells so so good when I walk in, it is lasting forever, everyone that walks in compliments the scent and how good it smells in my cute apartment lol
customer_reviews.author: French Kiss

customer_reviews.title: love this unusual fragrance!
customer_reviews.text: I love the fragrance. when we bought out house it had two little bottles of a fragrance in the bathrooms and i loved it. tried a million different things-owner said she picked it up at marshalls or some other store. I finally found Moroccan Amber by Nest at Nordstroms and have been using ever since. it's expensive but i get lots of comments on it. use it in three places- great room and two bathrooms.
customer_reviews.author: bobbi cashman

customer_reviews.title: Too sweet
customer_reviews.text: I expected it to be much more cedar-centric, more woodsy and earthy. It is very sweet smelling and very pervasive. I can even smell it in the hallway of my apartment. Now I am one of those people. Will consider buying from Nest again (the packaging and the bottle are very attractive), but definitely a different scent.
customer_reviews.author: VAreader507

customer_reviews.title: Very smelly reeds
customer_reviews.text: SMELLLSS sooooooooo GOOD Smells way better then the other two brands of Reed diffuser I got Just a little expensive but I guess you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.author: Codoje

customer_reviews.title: Strong, but not the scent I expected
customer_reviews.text: I bought these based upon the description of the scent. However - all I smell is 100% pine, which I do not love. And that’s just not the impression I got from the scent description. They do have really good throw for a diffuser. But if you get the holiday scent - just know it smells like pine and pine alone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Meh.
customer_reviews.text: Meh. I have it in my bedroom on my dresser. It looks nice. Doesn’t really smell much. I’ve had far better luck with Yankee Candle or some of those better known brands. This is a very masculine scent, I’ll give them that. But for $44, buy several at a retail store and your house will smell better.
customer_reviews.author: g-daddy

customer_reviews.title: love love love this scent
customer_reviews.text: love love love this scent. it made my bathroom smell like a fancy hotel bathroom. i used these for a party at my house . i love molton brown normally but they do not ship the reed diffusers to the US so i tried these and loved the reed dissuser, the soap and the lotion set. i also tried apricot tea and that is nice, more subtle. i tried the japanese black current, but that one is a bit too strong.
customer_reviews.author: Socal otobabe

customer_reviews.title: Super satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I buy this brand frequently. This is one of my two favorite scents. Very pleased with this product. Smells so nice without being overpowering. Pretty bottle.
customer_reviews.author: lmac

customer_reviews.title: Not strong enough and boring scent
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this but the scent was not strong enough to be effective. I’ve used other Nest diffusers and scents and all others have been stronger. This one was also very one note and not complex.
customer_reviews.author: Mike K.

customer_reviews.title: So much nicer than a candle or spray!  Love the scent!
customer_reviews.text: I love the smell! Bought it for our bedroom and every time I walk by I take a big calming breath! I am a little disappointed that it doesn’t seem to cover the entire bedroom. Definitely more noticeable the closer you are to it.
customer_reviews.author: Elisa Scherzinger

customer_reviews.title: I love this scent!
customer_reviews.text: I typically use scented candles, plug ins or oil warmer. However,I looking for something where i can "set it and forget it". I love the smell of anything citrusy. If you are a fan of Satsuma from the Body Shop then you will like this. It smells like sweet tangerines. The bottle is a little pricey and its worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Marina

customer_reviews.title: It's like opening your door and entering a luxurious spa.
customer_reviews.text: This scent (lemongrass and ginger) smells like a spa. It's refreshing and fresh and uplifting. I've also used the bamboo infuser and it is also wonderful. looks elegant. The wooden black reeds are included and work well. Love Nest products!
customer_reviews.author: CB2

customer_reviews.title: Amber Love
customer_reviews.text: Bought this strictly based off of the reviews. I’ve Been wanting a reed diffuser for a long time now and I came across this on Amazon. I love Amber and this really fills the room with such a delightful scent. Will definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Sfed

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Was very disappointed with this product considering the price. I can only smell it if I am within two feet of it and even added extra reeds
customer_reviews.author: Frank C.

customer_reviews.title: Great fragrance for home. Men and women love it. Long lasting.
customer_reviews.text: This is one of our favorite fragrances. VERY clean and warm. Great for home. I still wonder why these are $48, but they do last long.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Moloney

customer_reviews.title: Not Awful But Not Great
customer_reviews.text: Ehh....for the same price I got an 'incense' scent from origins that smells much better and real. This has notes of a "glad plug in " quality.....Not as bad as that...but a little cheap and artificial.
customer_reviews.author: john burke

customer_reviews.title: Cheap cologne smell
customer_reviews.text: OMG, opened this up eager to smell essential oils... couldn’t fine the exact ingredients on the box. It smells like cheap men’s Axe deodorant or similar. Can I return this now that I’ve opened it??? The worst scent ever!
customer_reviews.author: Pilar

customer_reviews.title: Awful
customer_reviews.text: Horrible scent. Like a cheap cologne. I bought 2 different scents from this brand, and had to throw both out.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I love the sense of nest candles and diffusers but this diffuser does not put out a loud smell at all. It would work best in a bathroom not a large room. As much as they cost you would think it would smell the whole room up but it doesn't
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase from Amazon!
customer_reviews.text: Fragrance is great I originally purchased in a store then bought another via Amazon. Do not purchase from Amazon! The scent is very faint compared to my original purchase. Either the product is old, stored improperly or there were problems with the batch. This is true also for the other Nest Fragrance I purchased from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Helen

customer_reviews.title: Good for very small rooms, ie. bathrooms.
customer_reviews.text: Love the smell and I have very small bedroom but I have the reverse the stems every few days. Best for smaller rooms.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Did not receive reeds.
customer_reviews.text: Love the scent and bottle it comes in but giving only three starts because I was under the impression that this product can with the reeds as well and was disappointed to see that there were not any in the package. I would easily give 5 stars if I got the reeds as well. UPDATE: Contacted NEST directly and they sent the reeds at no charge! 5 starts for NEST!
customer_reviews.author: Ray Marchand

customer_reviews.title: I smelled this fragrance in a high end store, ...
customer_reviews.text: I smelled this fragrance in a high end store, and decided to purchase. I have had the product out on my counter since August (3 months) and half evaporated. Will be buying again! Gives the house a fresh smell and not too overpowering.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

product_meta.title: NEST Fragrances Reed Diffuser- Ocean Mist & Sea Salt , 5.9 fl oz
product_meta.description: Color:Ocean Mist & Sea Salt| Design:DiffuserThe Ocean Mist & Sea Salt reed diffuser by NEST Fragrances combines the essence of a gentle ocean mist with notes of sea salt, white tea and coconut. NEST Fragrances diffusers are carefully crafted with the highest quality fragrance oils and are designed to continuously fill your home with a lush, memorable fragrance. The alcohol-free formula releases fragrance slowly and evenly into the air for approximately 90 days.
feature_bullets: NEST Fragrances Ocean Mist & Sea Salt Reed Diffuser has a refreshing essence of a gentle ocean mist combined with hints of sea salt, white tea and coconut.
The glass vessel are designed to compliment the beauty of its surroundings; the classic shape and modern stripe etching will complement any décor.
The alcohol-free formula releases fragrance slowly and evenly into the air for approximately 90 days.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars2,527 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
